title: Change the date of your driving theory test

details.description: Change your driving theory test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at
details.more_information:
You’ll need your provisional driving licence number.

You must give at least 3 clear working days’ notice to change your test date or you’ll have to pay again. Sundays and public holidays don’t count as working days.

Data protection

You can read the Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) before you start.
